Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1973...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 1/31/1973 (Going to STL: C J. Stearns. Going to CHC: 1B G. Ratliff)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1976, off Bill Dillman (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1976, off Gaylord Perry (SF)...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Philadelphia on 8/19/1978...
